website_summaries.verdict: Provides a professional look and plenty of space for a price that won't break your budget. A great starter briefcase that is practical and affordable.
pros: Solid, classic design with a lot of space for an affordable price
This model features vinyl with the look of real leather and two combination locks for security
cons: Some users have difficulties with the latches sticking

customer_reviews.title: Not expandable.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item and it lasted about a year and a half before it started coming apart and finally the latch broke. I got a second one, clicking the link directly from "previous orders" and reordered another one. This is not the same briefcase. It is a cheaper model that is not expandable like the last one was. I don't appreciate being directed to a different product. See my photo. The old one is on the right and the new one is on the left.
customer_reviews.author: Construction pro

customer_reviews.title: The locks don't work well, but it's a nice case
customer_reviews.text: Nice brief case, but setting the lock is very difficult. Unlike others that are gold, the lock is black like the case so it's hard to read the numbers. Then when I tried to set the numbers, the lock rollers would not roll. I tried adding some lock-ease lube, I got a few to roll. But after forcing the few of the rollers with a knife, I gave up. The case itself is nice. If they fixed the locks, it would be a very good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works really well and I feel like I actually amounted to something when I carry this ...
customer_reviews.text: Works really well and I feel like I actually amounted to something when I carry this around! I no longer use it, but I bought it to look like a very official substitute teacher, since I was only 21 and trying to make some extra cash on my days where I didn't have class. Was it overkill.. maybe it was.. but it was still fun to carry around and stored my laptop, day planner and books. The locks came in handy too since kids like to snoop through things. Yes, I really did buy this. My review can be taken lightly, but also very seriously when I say it is a great buy for the price!
customer_reviews.author: schandler rogers

customer_reviews.title: Latches broke after 13-months of careful use
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 13-months. For the money (sub $40) this is a good attaché. Although not included in the description, it DOES have expansion snaps. I did not want that feature, but kept the case anyway. The latches are cast from cheap pot-metal and despite me being a person who cares for his belongings, the latches broke within one week of showing cracks. I suppose if I were to amortize the cost of the case over 13-months it wasn't a 'horrible' investment. I just sucks that I must now find a replacement in short order. So... buyer be advised that the latches will require great care.
customer_reviews.author: Don U in Big Sky Country

customer_reviews.title: Great case!
customer_reviews.text: I chose this case because of the price. Surprisingly, this case is of high quality and built rugged enough to survive my work environment. The interior space is compatible with a more expensive case. In fact, exterior covering really simulates leather coverings. The hinges and locks are extremely well-built that both secure the contents of the case and holds the case open when removing materials. I recommend this case to other shoppers. It is a great value.
customer_reviews.author: chrisluce

customer_reviews.title: Very nice briefcase. Looks professional and lots of room inside
customer_reviews.text: Very nice briefcase. Looks professional and lots of room inside. The reviews state the lock stops working, but my boyfriend doesn't need to lock it so he just leaves the code unused and it works great! The only thing bad is if you put a computer or too much heavy stuff inside, the handle side pulls up higher than the side without the handle. It's not really made to be a carry-all, more just for files, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Jaja Hambone

customer_reviews.title: For the price I guess?
customer_reviews.text: I am a horse trainer and I am very hard on my brief cases. I stuff them full and force the latches closed lol. They get tossed and dragged around. I bought this case just a bout a year and 3 weeks ago it has been great! However last night the right locking latch just broke, so I am needing a new case. This thing took a beating. The rest of it is still in good shape! I would buy it again except I clearly need an expandable case! MY experience has been good with this case. And after reading reviews from many others I am going to say it's a crap shoot. Spin the wheel! Take a chance.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Netto

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made-don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: You’d think I’d learned my lesson by now. I think this is the third solo briefcase I’ve purchased for my husband, The closure on the briefcase actually snapped off only a few months after my husband started using it. I made the mistake of purchasing it in the fall, and having it as a back up for his last briefcase. I only think he use this for a few months before the “metal” clasp broke on one side, a piece of garbage. I would not recommend this briefcase at all.
customer_reviews.author: Luvz2cook

customer_reviews.title: solo attache case
customer_reviews.text: solo attache case in black leather is ok quality even though the inside bottom bubbled up a bit and i had to press down to even the surface. also the inner lock level hole on the right side behind in case seems not lined up correctly and has some split wood. the combination lock got jammed on the right side too. had to send back for a refund. not great craftsmanship or quality control.
customer_reviews.author: B. Minges

customer_reviews.title: When he came home over Christmas break I was shocked at how good the condition of it still was
customer_reviews.text: My son asked for this case to take with him to college instead of a back pack. When he came home over Christmas break I was shocked at how good the condition of it still was. It remains new-looking. He loves it and it fits his needs beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The case itself is nice but the lock combination set up is awful. Case won't open half the time and I sat here for an hour trying to open it after I set a combination. Maybe I just got a faulty product but overall very disappointed with it. I don't have time when traveling places to sit there and fiddle the case open for 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Silvester

customer_reviews.title: lasted 7 years!
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine in 2009 and one of the locks just broke. I definitely got my money's worth and i will be buying another one. If i get 5 years out of it, I'll be happy. I've spent a lot more on these type of attache cases and they last about the same. This is a very good case at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: EB 99

customer_reviews.title: I actually have bought two of these (MY BAD) - ...
customer_reviews.text: I actually have bought two of these (MY BAD) - - the first one lasted for 6 months before the lock on the right side broke - - the second one lasted for only two weeks before the mechanism that holds it in the open position stopped working and it would continuously close while in use. I have since bought a metal (aluminum) briefcase that is somewhat larger and does everything I need, and does not close by itself as you use it. The new one cost a little bit more, but I feel the value far exceeds the additional cost.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Sakowitz

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice looking Attache
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking Attache, but the inside folder started coming unglued from the lid. I repaired it by drilling holes in the top lid and installing nuts and bolts to hold it in place. The repair looks decent enough, but this is not a good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Tim J.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: But really, walking around in a suit with a dingy backpack just won't due. Laptop cases are too cushy looking for the style now, so just buy this briefcase. Do it. I look like a real adult and so can you. Also, it's totally cool.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Boothe

customer_reviews.title: It's not fancy and it's made of pleather but hey it holds all of my crap. Well
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3 year anniversary of this attache or briefcase, among many I've had over the past 30+ years. I bought it on the cheap, price went up a couple of bucks in 3 years. It's not fancy and it's made of pleather but hey it holds all of my crap. Well, until last week when I overloaded it and one of the latches snapped off, metal fatigue. I suppose I could just bungee cord it closed..I don't see anything else as economical so at about $9/year I'll take another one. Since I only have to work another 30 years or so until I can retire, I guess I need it for now.
customer_reviews.author: John W. Higley Jr

customer_reviews.title: This is the worst product I've ever bought from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst product I've ever bought from Amazon. I ordered it and one lock worked after setting and the other would not. I returned it for another one because I really liked it. However, it had the same exact problem. The setting levers are horribly designed. At this point I just want my money back. But the time wasted thinking this would be a good product, I'll never get that back
customer_reviews.author: Joshua A. Reece

customer_reviews.title: Latch broke after 13 months
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd briefcase from this manufacturer and both times one of the latches broke off. I don't have hard wear and tear. The brief case is carried by me and placed in the front seat of car and then carried in to client's homes. I open maybe 4 - 5 times a day. I don't even use the locks. Very disappointed. It comes with a warranty, but I've had no luck in getting it replaced. :-( Time to move on to another company/manufacturer. I'd say spend a few extra bucks and get a different brand. You will save money in the long run with replacements.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra L. Abatemarco

customer_reviews.title: Very nice lightweight briefcase
customer_reviews.text: Very nice lightweight briefcase. It was not designed to carry all the books that would fit in it. I noticed that the center strip where the handle is attached will start bowing outwards if overfilled. I'm still happy with it, as a tablet replaced most of the books i needed to carry anyhow. I don't mess with the locks after reading everyone's reviews, but I haven't had any issues with them.
customer_reviews.author: John Knollovic

customer_reviews.title: Great use at first, but it doesn’t last for the time you need
customer_reviews.text: I had multiple things break on me after 11 months of usage. A lock clip snapped off, the back panel of the case when you open it, the one that holds the pens and cards has come off because the glue isn’t holding it. I’m trying to find out how to speak to the manufacturer to see if they can replace it. I’ve read other reviews and they’d stated that they can.
customer_reviews.author: Sheng Li

customer_reviews.title: My son ordered it and was very happy that it was delivered in one day
customer_reviews.text: My son ordered it and was very unhappy as it came broke. However, the right lock is stuck, so we were not even able to set the new code. The latch on the right side is not operational at all. Very disappointed and would not recommend to anyone. Low quality. Will never purchase from these guys again. No one ever contacted us to help replace or fix the problem somehow. Horrible quality and non-existent service.
customer_reviews.author: S. Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Good and solid briefcase with lots of room
customer_reviews.text: I carry this briefcase everywhere I go. It has plenty of room to hold all of my important papers and supplies that I keep with me all the time. The lock is pretty secure and helps keep anyone out of my valuables just in case someone gained access to my office at work. It looks very professional when I go to client's houses. I would definitely recommend this briefcase.
customer_reviews.author: Victor K

customer_reviews.title: Briefcase
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely wonderful. Exactly what I was looking for. So happy I chose this one. Very good quality. Looks very professional and set up inside just like I want it. Perfecto!
customer_reviews.author: Rare and Collectible Books Emporium

customer_reviews.title: Very acceptable.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a graduation gift for my son-in-law. The briefcase seems solid and well-made. It is adequately spacious and laid-out conveniently. The grip is comfortable and seems well balanced in the hand. Everything lines-up as it should; the hinges operate smoothly and the locks are positive.
customer_reviews.author: David B. Hinton

customer_reviews.title: Cheap particle board framework bends and render your case useless.
customer_reviews.text: It broke the first day I got it. The issue is that the inside of the case is supported by a framework made out of a cheap particle board that deforms with the slightest amount of pressure. I mean the slightest. As in the pressure used to lock in the latches is actually enough to cause the framework to bend underneath it. This bending is more or less permanent, which means that after a couple of times opening and closing, the briefcase will no longer be able latch shut. It's a good prop but a terrible purchase for it's intended use. Yes, it's cheap--but invest a bit more.
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: It was a really nice briefcase, disappointed about the lock and that the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift, however the lock was faulty. I decided to send back and did not reorder because I didn't want to have the same issue if I purchased another one. It was a really nice briefcase, disappointed about the lock and that the recipient of my Christmas gift was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Starrlittsky

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly serviceable briefcase
customer_reviews.text: This is not a leather briefcase - and if that doesn't matter to you then this is a great deal. My husband is on his fourth or fifth Solo attache. They don't last forever but they look decent and have features that many higher-priced briefcases have. This model was formerly sold at Staples but I suppose not many people carry briefcases anymore.
customer_reviews.author: ARS

customer_reviews.title: These briefcases are DURABLE!
customer_reviews.text: I used this as a dance prop (so it took a massive beating throughout the season). It still is in great quality after being stood on, and beaten against the floor.
customer_reviews.author: CATFrasure

customer_reviews.title: My Husband loves it!
customer_reviews.text: He loves it. He kept talking about the color of it. It's a matte black not a shiny black. He loves how it feels too. He's happy so I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Shotty craftsmen ship
customer_reviews.text: The leather looks good but the locks broke the first day I get it. I still use it but I keep the briefcase shot with two old belts I had lying around.
customer_reviews.author: John Fox

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time or money.
customer_reviews.text: This item is COMPLETE crap. I ordered two of them for my two sons for Christmas. I discovered that the latch on one of them was completely snapped off when I went to wrap them. I contacted customer service and they (kinda) overnight-ed me another one. But guess what? IT WAS DAMAGED TOO! Now it is two days before Christmas and I have two useless brief cases. Supposedly they are over-nighting me yet another one but I am not holding out much hope that it will be undamaged.
customer_reviews.author: HellFireandHolyWater

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive, but looks expensive. My hubby uses it for meetings and he has no complaints. Lots of room for papers and a laptop. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: D. Burger

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: Never got to use it, never got the tags off. One of the locks was faulty and unusable. This was the first item I'd returned to Amazon.....they were fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: K. Mcclaran

customer_reviews.title: Brief case
customer_reviews.text: Received it, looks great, but lock doesn't work cant set it. Emailed company, no reply, their website doesn't show where this button is to push to set lock, I found one but still didn't lock. I am returning product. No reply on how to fix, only reply I got was they received my email, that was 3 days ago
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Simply Amazing Briefcase at an Amazing Price!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, amazing high quality briefcase....for such a BARGAIN! I've reciebed numerous compliments on this briefcase since I started bringing it to work. People thought it was a $200 briefcase. It looks very sleek and professional, and is finely crafted. I love all the compartments inside for cell phone, wallet, pens, paperwork, you can even fit a small laptop in there. The number locks work fine and the whole case feels very sturdy. All this for less than $20. Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Billy Batts

customer_reviews.title: My husband loved it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband sometime ago and he still has it. He really takes care of his things and hasn’t used it as much so I don’t know how well it would hold up with daily frequent use.
customer_reviews.author: NH

customer_reviews.title: so I think they liked it. When I received it
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for someone and I did not hear any complaints from them, so I think they liked it. When I received it, it looked sturdy and professional and seemed like a wonderful deal for the money they asked for. Inexpensive and nice-looking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I keep this in my vehicle to carry regularly used ...
customer_reviews.text: I keep this in my vehicle to carry regularly used papers such as brochures, business cards, etc. Before having this I regularly had a mess to deal with. Keeps me organized and my car looking professional.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Files
customer_reviews.text: I bought this briefcase for my husband because he likes to keep our documents safe in our home. He doesn't take it back and forth to work or anything so I can't speak to how durable it is in that aspect-however for how he uses it it works very well. I like the combination lock and the many multiple inner pouches/pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift and they loved it. The price was great compared to local stores prices. Plus briefcases for men are not that easy to find.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING MUST BUY
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first, buying such a briefcase online. But I'll tell you what, Ive been using this everyday now for 3 months, lugging it around from home to office, office to second office via subway, office to meetings (sometimes outdoors) with my MacBook Pro 13" in the sleeve and loaded up with folders, pencils and so on. Highly recommend this product considering its extraordinary price.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel P.

customer_reviews.title: A good product.
customer_reviews.text: The brief case is nice, light weight, has several nice internal features. I did have some trouble setting the combination lock and have some trouble reading the numbers on the lock. It is still a good product.
customer_reviews.author: David W. Atkins

customer_reviews.title: very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: my husband uses this everyday and after a year its falling apart. The inside came unglued and the snap on the lock broke off. it is very difficult to use the combination to unlock it. The latch to hold it open broke after only a couple of months. this was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Functions well and looks good. Can withstand a 33 lb toddler standing on ...
customer_reviews.text: Functions well and looks good. Can withstand a 33 lb toddler standing on it on a nightly basis in addition to the normal bumps and scrapes that an attaché case normally gets from being taken to work.
customer_reviews.author: StudioVRM

customer_reviews.title: It is really good enough for us since only lik $13 came from ...
customer_reviews.text: It is really good enough for us since only lik $13 came from our pockets and the rest from a gift card but the latches are out of alignment and choosing a code to lock it is a difficult task. Have used it daily since July 2016 and it hasn't fallen apart or fallen open.
customer_reviews.author: Franchesca

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping. Exactly as described. My husband needed a new briefcase and this was an excellent replacement for the price
customer_reviews.author: Southerndiva

customer_reviews.title: Great briefcase, 2nd one ive bought.
customer_reviews.text: Great briefcase, very roomy and looks very nice. Looks like it will last a while. It is a flat color which in my opinion looks awesome. Highly recommend due to all the space in it.
customer_reviews.author: Milton

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy don't buy A complete waste of money the whole thing fell apart I have paper bags that are stronger for free.
customer_reviews.author: conway

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: One lock broke. Contacted manufacturer and they had to exchange for another briefcase. Unable to repair the lock.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Williams

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking, though setting the lock is a pain
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking, though setting the lock is a pain. You need to have some sort of pliers to squeeze a tiny piece together, which is not specified in the directions at all.
customer_reviews.author: lmlaw

customer_reviews.title: Good case for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice case for the price. Right lock sticks a bit, but I think it will loosen up. Combination changes the first time but there is no way to change it after that, which is the reason for 1 less star.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Adams

customer_reviews.title: Spoilt lock
customer_reviews.text: The reviews were great so I bought it after already searching for a briefcase all over. I hadn’t even opened the lock only to see it in the amazon box. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Good value Briefcase
customer_reviews.text: Using this in a escape room and it is holding up really good. Nice value
customer_reviews.author: Michele Schoenberger

customer_reviews.title: A Wonderful Briefcase
customer_reviews.text: I love this briefcase. I've had it for awhile now. Used it instead of a backpack for school ('cause I was That One Weird Kid) from 10th to 11th grade and got a lot of compliments. It has a quality look and feel and the lock does stick a little sometimes, but it's still definitely worth it. A good case for a nice price.
customer_reviews.author: Sana

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this brief case as a Christmas present; ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this brief case as a Christmas present; however, it wasn't really what the person wanted when they indicated they wanted an attache case from Christmas. Overall, the brief case is okay. It took us about ten minutes to get it to open (even with the locks set on zero and the red tabs removed). Finally, once opened it was okay. I wouldn't definitely say its more manly, but we kept it and donated to my church for when they may need last minutes gifts. For the price, you cannot go wrong though.
customer_reviews.author: D Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Received 2 and Both Ended Up Broken/Defective
customer_reviews.text: The first time I received my package, the lock was broken and the corners were ripped. I ordered for an exchange and the 2nd one would not open. The lock on the left was stuck and would not open. Very upset that both packages came defective to me. I didn't want to wait another week to get another one so I just asked for a refund. Wouldn’t order this again.
customer_reviews.author: Maris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing only had it for a week but so far really good quality.
customer_reviews.author: David Troy

customer_reviews.title: decent briefcase
customer_reviews.text: This is a good inexpensive bookcase. I had my last briefcase for years and this was a replacement. It has good storage and snaps that allow a little expansion. I find it more than adequate for carrying papers and iPad to the office and it will even hold my laptop. For the price, it is a good briefcase.
customer_reviews.author: D. McDougald

customer_reviews.title: Locks broke
customer_reviews.text: It seemed very good quality then not even two weeks after I got it one of the locks doesn't work. I have to force it to close. And it's very heavy
customer_reviews.author: Sjohn185

customer_reviews.title: Love This Item.
customer_reviews.text: One of my fav items to have in the office to take on business trips. Not only does this briefcase look stylish, inside and out, it’s sturdy and the locking mechanism works great.
customer_reviews.author: Sparks

customer_reviews.title: A nice case for the $$$
customer_reviews.text: Quite a nice case for the $$$. Not a $200 Samsonite, but good value for the $$$. Nice exterior, well finished interior, not cheap at all.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Hageman

customer_reviews.title: Made for a great gift as it’s very solid
customer_reviews.text: Good solid case. Very happy with the product. Given as a gift. Price was good.
customer_reviews.author: D. Rounds

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Had this brief case less than a yr only using it once a month and it's started to fail. Horrible quality.
customer_reviews.author: Elijah Gore

customer_reviews.title: Price was right
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a truck driver and keeps all his belongings in his briefcase. We looked at probably a dozen models before we picked this one. None of the briefcases had great reviews, so we took a chance on this one. He is very happy with it. It is the perfect size and seems to be quite sturdy. Is it a Samsonite that is going to last for 10 years, no, but is it a decent product that will last for a few years, yes.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Whitcomb

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS THE BRIEFCASE TO BUY
customer_reviews.text: This is a very expensive looking briefcase. I love its not too soft smooth look.
customer_reviews.author: T-tamm

customer_reviews.title: Please replace this for me as I want to return for a better item.
customer_reviews.text: package had some physical damage I was not expecting. two tears on outside of package one was done by a box cuter I assume and the other was the fabric by the handle is torn. Please replace this for me as I want to return for a better item.
customer_reviews.author: Melvin G.

customer_reviews.title: Decent. Problem with the locks though.
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great about this. I like the feel and the space it provides. However I changed the lock combination as per the directions provided. One of locks will not close now. It will get stuck in the open position unless I manually close it. Or it will revert randomly back to the original lock combination.
customer_reviews.author: Everest View

customer_reviews.title: The locks work great and there is plenty of room inside to carry ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who wanted a new briefcase for his work tools. He has already received multiple compliments at work! Many pockets inside to store notebooks and writing instruments. The locks work great and there is plenty of room inside to carry multiple items.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: with very poor finishing. They claim to warranty for 5 years ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a Cheap bag, with very poor finishing. They claim to warranty for 5 years and both of my locks snapped in 8 months. Warraty? no one could assist .. I will stay away from this product..
customer_reviews.author: HARSHAD PATEL

customer_reviews.title: Durable and reliable
customer_reviews.text: After many drops and openings/closings it's lasted me for a long time! Bought a long time ago and it's still kicking and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: ArnoldReview

customer_reviews.title: It is a very good quality brief case
customer_reviews.text: It is a very good quality brief case very useful for day to day office work I Lov e it
customer_reviews.author: Raj Narayan

customer_reviews.title: But from everything I seen it was a very nice product. Glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: Bought product for a present. But from everything I seen it was a very nice product. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: vickie Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I've had this suitcase for a couple of months now and I love it so far. I can't wear a backpack on certain days because of uniform regulations, and this suitcase has ample room for me to put my notebooks, folders, calculators, pens, pencils, and even my laptop (which I would not advise since it would get pretty heavy). I love that it can extend half an inch thicker, if I ever need it. The suitcase looks very professional and I have received many compliments on it. It's not perfect, but it earns a well-deserved 4 stars at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Lanzona

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great, very very nice and classy looking. Inside is better than any woman’s purse.
customer_reviews.author: merlene propst

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This case is a cheaply made piece of junk. Unfortunately, I let it sit in my office without using it until my return window expired. What a waste of money. It is smaller than most briefcases and the capacity is limited. I should have read the "leather-like" part with more interest.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Poffenbarger

customer_reviews.title: Great briefcase for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good briefcase for the money; it is inexpensive and of reasonable quality. I use this to carry books or paper work to and from work. It latches well and the lock system works pretty well. It is a nice looking case and I use this almost every day, and I must say, I am quite satisfied with this product. 1. 2.
customer_reviews.author: Rama Rao

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed when I first saw it since I was trying ...
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed when I first saw it since I was trying to replace an older one with it. When I started using it I realized that it was light and durable and was exactly what I needed. The latches on my old briefcase both broke. Alexis on this new briefcase are almost identical so we'll see if they will last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdiness
customer_reviews.text: I liked the roominess. My husband uses it for work.
customer_reviews.author: W. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Briefcase
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift. I’m not sure if she’s used it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Judy L.

customer_reviews.title: Great budget briefcase, a couple minor flaws
customer_reviews.text: Product is exactly what I expected. The only downsides are the handle can be a little uncomfortable when the case is heavy, and the combo locks are a bit finicky about turning properly. The second part wasn't really a concern for me, since I have no need to lock it. It really does have a professional look to it. Overall, a great briefcase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. Professional
customer_reviews.text: Had to go on YouTube to find out how to set the locks. After a short video I sent my locks perfect. Have yet to see how long it will last but overall at this point I'm satisfied
customer_reviews.author: DJ King Tim

customer_reviews.title: Its a briefcase
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it long, but it looks good and looks like it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Lucht

customer_reviews.title: Latches BROKE within 30 days
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful briefcase expect the latches broke within the first month of having it so it just lays in my closet now because it’s unusable. If the company would replace my broken case I’d be happy but so far I’m left with a broken briefcase that I can’t use at all.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: This product is not of good quality and I am not recommended to anyone to ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is not of good quality and I am not recommended to anyone to buy this case. I bought it only 12 months ago and used not often. Based on seller's advertising it has 5 years warranty on quality and work. However, the locks on bag are broken after 12 months and Amazon denied to help me and sent to manufacture. So, on my opinion, this item is not worth this price because of uncertified quality.
customer_reviews.author: Oleg Tchernyahovsky

customer_reviews.title: I realized it was basically made out of paper and extremely easy to tamper with
customer_reviews.text: the bag came with one side of the lock dysfunctional, once I closed it I could not open it anymore. Unfortunately I had already put my passports inside and had to rip it apart to get them. When I did, I realized it was basically made out of paper and extremely easy to tamper with. The price is cheap but it is a waste of money. I would not recommend it. spent a little more for a batter case.
customer_reviews.author: Jeton Ferrao

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Works great. It’s pretty lightweight, which is nice when needing to transport
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks professional, simple design, good value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband to replace another briefcase with broken clasps and he's very happy with this briefcase. We have looked for a replacement in local office supply stores but did not find a attache that was wide enough for his files. He wanted hard sides and needed it to expand. This new briefcase is not as expandable as his last so he carries his old camera separately. Other than that, this works perfectly for a smaller camera and several files. Very good value and looks professional too.
customer_reviews.author: ECHagler

customer_reviews.title: Wow nice!  Quality throughout.
customer_reviews.text: Super nice! Looks expensive. Very much worth the purchase price plus a bunch... no regrets at all. Leather. Internal organizer pockets. Dual locks. I set my own codes. Will it stand the test of time? 3 hours of train time daily? Let's find out! ** Update 09/22/12 ** Case is still holding up very well. Daily use. Heavy thermos (which fits perfectly as if made for the case) is no problem. The 5 star rating stands.
customer_reviews.author: Stealthy like a cat

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great value for your money! Gave as a gift and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: mary Reed

customer_reviews.title: EXcellent combination lock briefcase
customer_reviews.text: EXcellent combination lock briefcase. It was not expensive, so I really wasn't expecting much but this is a quality item and the numbers on the combination lock do not get stuck.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: You cant beat this brief case for under $299
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this briefcase now for several weeks. Quality product. I would recommend this product to anyone looking for a $99-299 quality product at an obvious huge discount. Quite Impressed. It even has protective feet! Business card holder! And a combo lock, I dont know what more you could need.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Chaffee

customer_reviews.title: Great leather product quality
customer_reviews.text: Honored warranty, overall quality. First case hit the lock faulty so free of charge replacement came after great customer care. Enjoy this inexpensive yet luxurious enough suit for the common modern professional lol
customer_reviews.author: Luis A. Trejo

customer_reviews.title: Good case for the price
customer_reviews.text: Case is made very well for the price. Locks don't unlock when pushed sometimes. Only reason I didn't give it a 5.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hammack

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great product, the case is sturdy and the interior is organized.
customer_reviews.author: Marquis de Faux

customer_reviews.title: Second was good. I received lots of compliments
customer_reviews.text: First one came with a broken latch. Second was good. I received lots of compliments. It looks very high quality for the price. Only used it for four days so no clue on how long it will last. Has a good warranty.
customer_reviews.author: bms231

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I needed something inexpensive to carry around my papers and I just love this. It's not slander it's nice and thick so I can put other things in it even a small lunch. The snaps work well and I have not had any problem with it
customer_reviews.author: Terry Westlake

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice but doesn't expand much but gets the job done
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Like the ability to carry personal equiptment from home to place of use.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph S.

customer_reviews.title: and the handle is reasonably comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Does what it claims to. This is a cheap, decent briefcase, and you get what you pay for. It's an attractive piece, and the handle is reasonably comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hummel

customer_reviews.title: removed the internal parts with an exacto knife - simply ...
customer_reviews.text: removed the internal parts with an exacto knife - simply stitching to remove. now use this as a case for decks of magic cards with the help of some cardboard dividers. Effective, secure, and classy.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Lunchaousen

product_meta.title: Solo New York Grand Central Attaché Case with Dual Combination Locks - Attaché Case for Men - Hard-Sided Briefcase - Large Capacity - Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackDesigned for the hard-working, multitasking professional, the Solo New York Grand Central Attaché Case with Dual Combination Locks is practical, durable, and elegant. To keep your business and personal items such as files and papers safe and secured, this briefcase for men is equipped with dual combination locks. An instructional video provides clear and easy-to-follow instructions. The large-capacity main compartment is big enough to store your laptop and tablet, while the file pocket with a Velcro closure ensures you can store files and other critical documents with enhanced organization. This briefcase with lock includes a file pocket and an interior organizer section to keep your business necessities like business cards, cell phones, pens, and pencils neatly organized and secured. The Grand Central includes four metal protective standing feet on the bottom for extra protection and stability. The exterior measurements are 12.5" (h) x 17.5" (l) x 4" (w). Our attaché bags for men are designed to provide flexibility for those who are constantly on the go. In fact, since 2008, we have designed our travel briefcases with a unique style inspired by the bustling streets of New York City. The New York Grand Central Attaché Case is backed by a five-year warranty.
feature_bullets: Ideal Attache Case : The Solo New York grand central attaché case is the perfect black briefcase for the multitasking professional; It’s a classic professional attaché case, crafted with a sleek design and smart features

Secure Dual Combination Locks : This attaché briefcase is equipped with dual combination locks to ensure business essentials, files, and papers are safely secured; An instructional video provides clear and easy to follow instructions

Superior Organization : The New York grand central includes a file pocket and an interior organizer section to keep necessities like business cards, cell phones, pens, and pencils neatly organized and secured

Plenty Of Storage Space : We’ve designed the grand central attaché case for men with four metal protective standing feet on the bottom for extra protection and stability; The exterior measurements are 12.5" (h) x 17.5" (l) x 4" (w); The interior measurements are 11.75” (h) x 16.75” (l) x 2.75” (w)
5 Year warranty: Guaranteed to be unstoppable; We guarantee every bag to be free from defects in materials and craftsmanship for five years from the date of purchase

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
